name: Zakil Wood
overview: From the depths of ZAKIL WOOD you must collect the ruby which has protected your village for centuries. If you can pass the two-headed Pyral then the adventure starts in earnest. ZAKIL WOOD is a complete adventure but the story will continue in further adventures. ZAKIL WOOD is a complete adventure but the story will continue in further adventures. Although the description suggests that there would be sequels, this was the sole game in the series. In 2019, a port for MSX2 was created by NataliaPC using her MSX2DAAD code; it is available in both English and Spanish.
